title: The Strange Signal
description:
You are Agent Shadow, assigned to investigate a low-priority signal that slipped through automated filters.

At 02:13 AM, a short burst transmission was captured from an unidentified endpoint. The message appears structured, but its contents are not immediately readable.

Preliminary analysis suggests that the message is not encrypted using complex algorithms, but rather transformed into another representation.

The intercepted message reads:

SElUe2Jhc2U2NF9kZWNvZGVkX2NsZWFuX1Q3elFhNE59

Your mission: Recover the original message hidden within this transmission.
hints: The format looks familiar to common encoding schemes.
Not all transformations are meant to secure data

title: The Fragmented Transmission
description:
Agent Shadow, a fragment of data was intercepted from a legacy system associated with the target group.

The captured transmission appears highly structured, yet it does not resemble any conventional message format. Each segment is separated in a consistent pattern, suggesting intentional organization rather than random noise.

Despite multiple scans, no known signatures or obvious markers were identified. Analysts believe the meaning is embedded within the structure itself rather than hidden through complex protection mechanisms.

The intercepted sequence:

01001000 01001001 01010100 01111011 01100010 01101001 01110100 01110011 01011111 01110100 01101111 01011111 01101100 01100101 01110100 01110100 01100101 01110010 01110011 01011111 01011000 00111001 01100110 00110011 01001011 01110001 00110111 01111101

Your mission: Interpret the structure and recover the hidden message.
hints: Focus on how the data is grouped

title: The Silent Page
description:
Agent Shadow, a suspicious webpage was recovered from a compromised internal server.

At first glance, the page appears blank—almost as if it contains no useful data. However, intelligence reports suggest that this page was deliberately crafted to conceal information in plain sight.

No scripts, just a simple page that refuses to reveal its secrets easily.

You are advised to examine the page more carefully.

Your mission: Discover what the page is hiding.
hints: Not everything visible is everything present
Try interacting with the page differently

title: The Overlooked Detail
description:
Agent Shadow, an image file was extracted from a suspect’s device during forensic analysis.

Initial scans showed nothing unusual—no metadata anomalies, no embedded files, no encryption layers.

The image was likely designed to appear ordinary unless examined with attention.

Your mission: Inspect the visual carefully and uncover any concealed detail.

title: The Inconsistent Output
description:
Agent Shadow, during an investigation into a compromised terminal, a suspicious output was recorded from an internal system.

At first glance, the message appears legitimate and follows the expected format. However, deeper analysis of system behavior suggests that the output may not be entirely reliable.

There are subtle inconsistencies between what is displayed and what is actually processed by the system. Logs indicate that the interface may be presenting altered information to mislead observers.

Your mission: Identify the discrepancy in the message in the file and retrieve the true message hidden behind this output.

title: Multi-File Assembly
description:
A simple webpage can hide more than what meets the eye.
Somewhere within the resources quietly loaded in the background, fragments of a secret are scattered.

Not every file is trustworthy — some are merely distractions placed to mislead curious minds.
Only the keen observer who carefully examines what the browser fetches will uncover meaningful clues.

Within certain style and script resources lie encoded fragments.
Each valid fragment carries a clear identity, marked in sequence.
When the genuine parts are gathered and arranged correctly, they begin to tell a story.

But the message is not immediately readable — it speaks in another form.
Transform it into something human-readable, and the hidden truth will reveal itself.

title: Disabled Button Attribute
description:
The page may not reveal everything through interaction alone — some answers lie beneath its visible layers.


- Look for hidden information in comments
- Find all parts of the flag
- Combine them to reveal the complete flag

title: Browser Cookies
description:
Not all treasures are displayed on the page itself — some are quietly stored where the browser keeps its memories.

Among the many crumbs left behind, one carries a layered secret that only repeated decoding will fully uncover.

title: Background Image Filename
description:
Not every clue is written in plain text — some are woven subtly into the design itself.

Look closely at the elements that appear purely decorative, as even background details and unseen layers may carry an encoded message waiting to be revealed.

title: Text is behind another element
description:
What seems to block your view may only be a distraction placed above something important.

Clear the obstruction and examine both the hidden layer and its subtle styling details — the full message emerges only when every concealed fragment is brought together.

title: Hidden Scroll Area
description:
The page may seem limited to what first appears on the screen, but its boundaries are not as fixed as they look.

Expand your perspective, explore beyond the visible frame, and pay attention to even the faintest traces — sometimes a nearly invisible pattern holds the true message

title: The Presence of Absence
description:
We are accustomed to searching for meaning in what appears before us, ignoring the vast silence of the negative space.

Sometimes the most significant revelation is not written in ink, but hidden in the very gaps left between the lines of a narrative that seems already complete.

title: The Triumvirate's Offset
description:
The signals of the past are never truly deleted; they are merely realigned using protocols from an ancient era directed by the house of Julius.

A simple turn of the wheel is all that separates static from direction, requiring a specific re-alignment to restore the original signal from the noise.

title: The Document's Depth
description:
Digital archives hold more than just the words visible on the page; they contain layers of metadata that record the environment of their creation.

A methodical inspection of the background noise can reveal patterns that standard reading would never uncover, provided you are willing to look into the file's internal properties.

title: jwt_manipulation
description:
A token has been intercepted, but it's password protected.

Find the password to unlock the token and decode it to reveal the flag.

title: Broken The Logic
description:
Debug the provided Python code snippets, which contain intentional errors. 

Identify and correct all mistakes. Pass all test cases to obtain the Flag.

title: Logic Lockdown
description:
Find the FIVE cars I like!! 

Explore the vehicle collection and identify the correct cars

title: catch me if you can
description:
Visit an external website and explore it to find the hidden flag. 

Use your web exploration skills!

title: Silent Identity
description:
This MP3 file appears completely normal.

It plays without issue.

There is no hidden audio.

But files often carry more than just sound.

Find the flag.

title: A Matter of Perspective
description:
The message below was written in a hurry.

}gnirts_elpmis_yrev{TIH

Sometimes, the simplest transformations are the easiest to overlook.

Recover the original flag.

title: Echo Within Echo
description:
The following transmission was captured from a repeating channel:

U0VsVWUybGZZVzFmYUdGamEyVnlYMHBMTmpkOQ==

At first glance, it seems solvable.

Take another look.

title: Misplaced Letters
description:
Agent Shadow intercepted a message that appears almost readable at first glance.

HIT{e3lpmis_3v3r_yreV}

The structure looks correct, but something feels… out of order.

Recover the original flag.

title: Nothing Here
description:
Agent Shadow recovered a small text file from a suspect’s device.

Initial inspection suggests the file contains no useful information.

But sometimes, what appears insignificant deserves a second look.

Download the file and investigate carefully.
